John "White Hat" Greene

References

1. Vital Record of Rhode Island. 1636-1850. A Family Register for the People. 21 volumes. Arnold, James Newell. Providence, R.I.: Narragansett Historical Publishing Company, 1891–1912. Digitized images from Cornell Univesity Library and New England Historic Genealogical Society.

  • A. Joseph's Birth

    Vol. 1. Kent County: Warwick - Births and Deaths, pg. 169.

  • B. Possibly John and Mary's Marriage

    Vol. 7. Friends and Ministers: Narragansett Friends Record - Marriages, pg. 134

  • C. John’s Death

    Vol. 1. Kent County: West Greenwich - Births and Deaths, pg. 72

2. Rhode Island, Compiled Census and Census Substitutes Index, 1740-1890 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 1999. Original data: Jackson, Ronald V., Accelerated Indexing Systems, comp.. Rhode Island Census, 1740-1890. Compiled and digitized by Mr. Jackson and AIS from microfilmed schedules of the U.S. Federal Decennial Census, territorial/state censuses, and/or census substitutes.

3. Greene, F. L. (1894). Descendants of Joseph Greene of Westerly, R.I: Also other branches of the Greenes of Quidnesset, or Kingston, R.I., and other lines of Greenes in America. Albany, N.Y: Joel Munsell’s Sons.

  • John Greene - pg. 14

4. Find A Grave, database and images (https://www.findagrave.com), memorial page for John “White Hat” Greene (1688-29 Mar 1752), Find A Grave Memorial no. 159965152; Maintained by root bound (contributor 48845271) Unknown.

Born: 1688 (3, 4)

Birthplace: Quidnesset (North Kingstown), Washington County, Rhode Island (3, 4)

Mother: Humility Coggeshall (3, 4)

Father: Benjamin Greene (3, 4)

Wife: Mary Aylesworth (1, 3, 4)

Married: December 16, 1709 (1)

Marriage Place: Unknown (?)

Direct Descendant: Joseph Greene (1, 3)

Death: March 29, 1752 (1, 3, 4)

Death Place: West Greenwich, Kent County, Rhode Island (1, 3, 4)

Burial Place: Unknown (?)
